title: I can not create an account on PBE
body: Every time I 'm going to create an account on PBE , always the error 500 , what can I do to solve this problem ?

replies.body:
Sometimes it can be caused by the browser you are using as well, if what said above doesn't work try using a different browser.

^_^ Hope it works.

When you experience HTTP 500 errors when trying to access the PBE signup, it's typically caused by a bad link. Try accessing the PBE signup page [from this link.](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if this worked~
